message: lerna: add script to help test with verdaccio

lerna: update configs for workspaces

- Set yarn as client
- Set independent version mode in package.json
- Use Workspaces in lerna and package.json

main: update verdaccio scripts

- rename bounce script
- add kill script
- update readme
build: add and enforce conventional commits

build: implement linting concerns

- conventional commit to enforce commit messages
- lint-staged to fix commits before check in
build: restrict lint-staged to guard react-components & vue-plugin
build: hoist babel deps to root
test: move ui test apps to their own workspace
build: add webpack analysis for packages

build: add packages scripts clean and test

- yarn clean - clean all non-root workspaces
- yarn clean:all - all workspaces including root and removes yarn.lock
- test - run all tests, currently tests for @drizzle/{store,vue-plugin}
- test:store - run only tests for @drizzle/store
- test:store:verbose - run only tests for @drizzle/store passing verbose
  flag
- test:vue - run only tests for @drizzle/vue-plugin
docs: add dev NPM scripts to README
